name: @nightwatch/schematics
description: Adds Nightwatch to an existing Angular CLI project

scripts.build:clean:launch:v10: npm run build && npm run clean:launch:v10
scripts.build:clean:launch:v12: npm run build && npm run clean:launch:v12
scripts.build:clean:launch:v14: npm run build && npm run clean:launch:v14
scripts.clean:launch:v10: npm run clean:v10 && npm run launch:v10
scripts.clean:launch:v12: npm run clean:v12 && npm run launch:v12
scripts.clean:launch:v14: npm run clean:v14 && npm run launch:v14
scripts.clean:v10: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-v10 && git clean -f -d sandbox-v10
scripts.clean:v12: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-v12 && git clean -f -d sandbox-v12
scripts.clean:v14: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-v14 && git clean -f -d sandbox-v14
scripts.dev:build: cd sandbox && npm link ../ && ng run sandbox:nightwatch-run
scripts.launch:v10: npm run link:sandbox:v10 && cd sandbox-v10 && ng add $npm_package_name --remove-protractor --environment='chrome' --no-cucumber-runner && npm link ../
scripts.launch:v12: npm run link:sandbox:v12 && cd sandbox-v12 && ng add $npm_package_name --remove-protractor --environment='chrome' --no-cucumber-runner && npm link ../
scripts.launch:v14: npm run link:sandbox:v14 && cd sandbox-v14 && ng add $npm_package_name --remove-protractor --environment='chrome' --no-cucumber-runner && npm link ../
scripts.link:sandbox:v10: npm link && cd sandbox-v10 && npm link $npm_package_name
scripts.link:sandbox:v12: npm link && cd sandbox-v12 && npm link $npm_package_name
scripts.link:sandbox:v14: npm link && cd sandbox-v14 && npm link $npm_package_name
scripts.test: npm run build:clean:launch && npm run test:sandbox:v14 && npm run clean
scripts.test:sandbox:v14: cd sandbox-14 && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run e2e
scripts.unlink:sandbox: cd sandbox && npm unlink $npm_package_name && cd .. && npm unlink

author: Vaibhav Singh <vaibhav.s@browserstack.com>
